short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture and enrich contacts from LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Leverage the full power of Common Room's Person360â„¢ platform to capture and enrich the contacts you care about directly from LinkedIn so that you can act on the people that matter, when it matters.

NOTE: You will need a Common Room account to use the extension. If you don't already have an account, sign up at https://commonroom.io to get started with a free trial.
